topLevelComment.author: @BlvckBash

replies.text:
I should have covered that in the video but I was rushing to get it out ü´£

If you install using the method I describe (running yellow wire to the head unit) it will likely replace all the 360 feeds and only show the backup camera (unconfirmed). I suspect if you were to send the video signal through the OEM harness, you could get HD for just the backup camera (also unconfirmed)

replies.text: I ended it up doing it the way you showed it, but what did you do with the blue cable that goes along with the yellow cable in the front?
replies.author: @nickgopic

replies.text: @nickgopic ignore it - i think if you cut it, it hardcodes the red/yellow/green backup guidelines on the video signal.  Q's dont need that because they have the predictive guidelines that adjust with steering angle

replies.text: Sweet, thanks Rob!
